name: Automated Vulnerability Assessment and Patching
desc: Developed an automated vulnerability assessment and patching solution with Nessus, Splunk, and SOAR to improve security and compliance in enterprise cloud infrastructure.

name: Network Vulnerability Scanner
desc: Created a custom scanning tool to identify open ports, outdated services, and known vulnerabilities in networks. Implemented multi-threading for efficiency and generated detailed reports. Used for testing lab environments and developing detection rules.

name: Penetration Testing Toolkit
desc: Developed and customized Bash/Python scripts for common penetration testing tasks, including directory brute-forcing, credential spraying, and payload generation. Conducted lab-based simulations using Kali Linux and Metasploit Framework. Emphasized safe testing practices and documentation of findings.

name: Al-Powered Phishing Email Detection
desc: Built a Streamlit-based application for offline phishing email analysis using rege and rule-based heuristics. Integrated user-friendly interface to scan .eml files or raw email content. Deployed publicly on Streamlit Cloud with Git-based version control.

name: Fault-Tolerant Multi-Regional Web Application
desc: Designed and deployed Azure-based architecture with load balancers, availability sets, and geo-routing. Applied secure network design principles (NSGs, firewall rules). Focused on ensuring availability and resilience for distributed users.
